item.title: February 2022
item.description: Posts: Minsky Moments in Venture Capital Linguistic Phenomena: Mondegreen Eggcorn Malapropism Vidoes: Did Dua Lipa ACTUALLY Plagiarize Levitating? Using AI to accelerate scientific discovery - Demis Hassabis You Can’t Hear This Chord Without Crying. Quotes: Social critic Neil Postman contrasted the worlds of Nineteen Eighty-Four and Brave New World in the foreword of his 1985 book Amusing Ourselves to Death. He writes:(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Brave_New_World) “What Orwell feared were those who would ban books.
